Package org.cse.client

Interface Summary
Application Interface defining all methods as required by the CSE-Builder application.
Styles Encapsulation of CSS style names used by the application UI
 

Class Summary
AbstractPanel Abstract panel is to contain widgets allowing end user to perform a single action in the flow of the application.
AnnotationsChangedEvent Wrapper class to carry information about changes within AnnotationsPanel
AnnotationsPanel Panel wrapping controls allowing end user to fetch bookmarks and to be able to generate CSE annotations for further consumption.
ContextPanel Panel wrapping controls allowing end user to compile CSE context based on the tag and annotation information captured by other panels.
Controller The controller provides with utilities which include: I18NFactory, UIHelper, Application implementation and notifications via ChangeListener
csebuilder Main Entry point point class where the configuration of the environment happens.
MainPanel The Main panel is responsible for configuring and linking all application panels.
SaveAsDlg  
TagProviderChangedEvent Wrapper class to carry information about changes within TagProviderPanel
TagProviderPanel Panel wrapping controls allowing end user to fetch tags and configure them for further consumption.
